name: ClimateVisualisations
0: ”Alexa, open Climate Facts for temperature in January 1990.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: climate facts
des: This skill provides information and visualisation regarding global past average surface temperatures. Generated using Copernicus Climate Change Service information [2019]. Neither the European Commission nor ECMWF is responsible for any use that may be made of the Copernicus information or data it contains.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
